title: Episode 139 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 139 including plot summary, character debuts, production credits, and trivia.

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 1 -- Dragons, Goats and Rainbow Mists
author: Stephen (Blackjack Rants)
description: Critical analysis of One Piece filler arcs including the Ruluka Island/Rainbow Mist arc (Episodes 139-143). The reviewer finds the arc 'slightly more interesting than the Goat Island story' but criticizes its pacing and too many underutilized characters. Notes that the Rainbow Mist concept is vague and the emotional impact is undermined by narrative choices.

title: 139: 'Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Ruluka Island!'
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Positive review of Episode 139 from a first-time viewer. Praises the worldbuilding of Ruluka Island's oppressive taxation system, the entertaining marine chase opening, and the Rainbow Mist mystery setup. Criticizes Henzo for stealing the Going Merry. Overall assessment: 'good job on episode 139' with 'humour, world-building and just a touch of plot and creepiness.'

title: One Piece: Ruluka Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive review and recap of the entire Ruluka Island Arc (Episodes 139-143). The review gives the arc a score of 4.5/10, noting that it presents moments of intrigue and frustration with an enticing premise that falls short of delivering a cohesive and engaging narrative. Criticizes convoluted storylines, illogical character choices, and a lackluster, rushed finale.

title: Ruluka Island Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for the Ruluka Island Arc covering all five episodes (139-143), plot synopsis, character information, and production details. Notes that this was the last filler arc dubbed by 4Kids Entertainment.

title: Henzo - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character profile for Henzo including his appearance, personality, background, and role in the Ruluka Island Arc. Details his fifty-year quest to find his lost childhood friends.

title: Rapanui Pasqua - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character profile for Rapanui Pasqua including his appearance, abilities (Finger Bomb technique), background as one of the Pumpkin Pirates, and his dual role as Marine officer and Henzo's childhood friend.

title: One Piece - Episode 139: Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Luluka Island!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for Episode 139 on Crunchyroll. Provides the complete episode with subtitles.

title: Ruluka Island Arc - One Piece - Fandorable
author: Fandorable
description: Detailed analysis of the Ruluka Island Arc including its plot, themes, cultural impact, and critical reception. Covers all episodes 139-143 and discusses the arc's strengths and weaknesses.

title: 15 Worst One Piece Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: Screen Rant
description: Ranking article listing the worst One Piece filler arcs. The Ruluka Island Arc is included in the list, with criticism focused on its convoluted storylines and limited role for the Straw Hat Pirates.
